text: 1.13 2 Ko 1.22, 6.7, Epe 4.30, Kol 1.4-6 Pen nɨbi binɨb Juda mel okok abe, takaw nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl ak nɨgem, God nɨbop gek binɨb ne mɨdebɨm. Takaw teplep anɨb ak anɨb agup, God nɨbop tɨg asɨk dup. Nɨbi Klays nop gos lɨnɨŋɨd jɨmñɨl mɨdebɨm ak nɨm, God Kawnan ne ak nɨbop ñub. Ned God ne takaw aglɨl agak, Kawnan yad ak binɨb yad okok kɨlop ñɨnɨgayn agak. Anɨb ak chɨn nopun, nɨbi binɨb ne mɨdebɨm.
